properties.entry:
SELECT D.RNUM , D.GOODS_NO , D.GOODS_NAME , D.GOODS_PRICE , D.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , D.GOODS_TYPE_NO , D.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , D.CREATED_DATE , D.GOODS_STATUS , D.MODIFIED_DATE FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.GOODS_NO , C.GOODS_NAME , C.GOODS_PRICE , C.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , C.GOODS_TYPE_NO , C.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , C.CREATED_DATE , C.GOODS_STATUS , C.MODIFIED_DATE
FROM( SELECT A.GOODS_NO , A.GOODS_NAME , A.GOODS_PRICE , A.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.GOODS_TYPE_NO , B.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , A.CREATED_DATE , A.GOODS_STATUS , A.MODIFIED_DATE FROM MG_GOODS A JOIN MG_GOODS_TYPE B ON (B.GOODS_TYPE_NO = A.GOODS_TYPE_NO) WHERE A.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.GOODS_NO DESC ) C )D WHERE D.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.GOODS_NO , A.GOODS_NAME , A.GOODS_PRICE , A.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.GOODS_TYPE_NO , B.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , A.CREATED_DATE , A.GOODS_STATUS , A.MODIFIED_DATE FROM MG_GOODS A JOIN MG_GOODS_TYPE B ON (B.GOODS_TYPE_NO = A.GOODS_TYPE_NO) WHERE A.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.GOODS_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_GOODS A WHERE A.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_GOODS A JOIN MG_GOODS_TYPE C ON (A.GOODS_TYPE_NO = C.GOODS_TYPE_NO) WHERE A.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.GOODS_TYPE_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_GOODS A JOIN MG_GOODS_TYPE C ON (A.GOODS_TYPE_NO = C.GOODS_TYPE_NO) WHERE A.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.GOODS_TYPE_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_GOODS A JOIN MG_GOODS_TYPE C ON (A.GOODS_TYPE_NO = C.GOODS_TYPE_NO) WHERE A.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.GOODS_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT D.RNUM , D.GOODS_NO , D.GOODS_NAME , D.GOODS_PRICE , D.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , D.GOODS_TYPE_NO , D.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , D.CREATED_DATE , D.GOODS_STATUS , D.MODIFIED_DATE FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.GOODS_NO , C.GOODS_NAME , C.GOODS_PRICE , C.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , C.GOODS_TYPE_NO , C.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , C.CREATED_DATE , C.GOODS_STATUS , C.MODIFIED_DATE
FROM( SELECT A.GOODS_NO , A.GOODS_NAME , A.GOODS_PRICE , A.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.GOODS_TYPE_NO , B.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , A.CREATED_DATE , A.GOODS_STATUS , A.MODIFIED_DATE FROM MG_GOODS A JOIN MG_GOODS_TYPE B ON (B.GOODS_TYPE_NO = A.GOODS_TYPE_NO) WHERE A.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.GOODS_TYPE_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.GOODS_NO DESC ) C )D WHERE D.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT D.RNUM , D.GOODS_NO , D.GOODS_NAME , D.GOODS_PRICE , D.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , D.GOODS_TYPE_NO , D.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , D.CREATED_DATE , D.GOODS_STATUS , D.MODIFIED_DATE FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.GOODS_NO , C.GOODS_NAME , C.GOODS_PRICE , C.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , C.GOODS_TYPE_NO , C.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , C.CREATED_DATE , C.GOODS_STATUS , C.MODIFIED_DATE
FROM( SELECT A.GOODS_NO , A.GOODS_NAME , A.GOODS_PRICE , A.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.GOODS_TYPE_NO , B.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , A.CREATED_DATE , A.GOODS_STATUS , A.MODIFIED_DATE FROM MG_GOODS A JOIN MG_GOODS_TYPE B ON (B.GOODS_TYPE_NO = A.GOODS_TYPE_NO) WHERE A.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.GOODS_TYPE_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.GOODS_NO DESC ) C )D WHERE D.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT D.RNUM , D.GOODS_NO , D.GOODS_NAME , D.GOODS_PRICE , D.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , D.GOODS_TYPE_NO , D.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , D.CREATED_DATE , D.GOODS_STATUS , D.MODIFIED_DATE FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.GOODS_NO , C.GOODS_NAME , C.GOODS_PRICE , C.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , C.GOODS_TYPE_NO , C.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , C.CREATED_DATE , C.GOODS_STATUS , C.MODIFIED_DATE
FROM( SELECT A.GOODS_NO , A.GOODS_NAME , A.GOODS_PRICE , A.GOODS_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.GOODS_TYPE_NO , B.GOODS_TYPE_NAME , A.CREATED_DATE , A.GOODS_STATUS , A.MODIFIED_DATE FROM MG_GOODS A JOIN MG_GOODS_TYPE B ON (B.GOODS_TYPE_NO = A.GOODS_TYPE_NO) WHERE A.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.GOODS_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.GOODS_NO DESC ) C )D WHERE D.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
